whatWeDo.body:
We make personal remembrance songs for funerals and memorials â€“ based on your memories.

Families fill out a short questionnaire about the person who has passed.

aboutUs.headline: Meet Thea & Mia
aboutUs.body:
We are two friends, both psychology students with a deep love for music and people.

Thea has sung and played piano at many funerals.
Mia has a background in voice and storytelling.

Together, we create something that is both comforting and personal: a song for someone who meant the world to you.

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions

q1.question: What exactly do you do?
q1.answer: We write personal, individual songs in memory of a loved one. Based on a short questionnaire, we create a song that reflects the person's life, personality and story â€“ for the funeral or as a lasting memory.

q2.question: Who is behind "Sang til deg"?
q2.answer: We are Thea and Mia â€“ two psychology students with a musical background. Thea is also a pianist and has experience with funerals. Our motivation is to create modern, emotional and personal ways of saying goodbye.

q3.question: How does it work?
q3.answer: You fill out our short questionnaire. From that, we compose and write a unique song. You receive the recording digitally and can play it at the funeral or simply keep it for yourself.

q4.question: How long does it take until I receive the song?
q4.answer: Usually we need 2-3 days, depending on the volume of requests. If it's particularly urgent, we'll find a solution â€“ just write to us.

q5.question: How much does it cost?
q5.answer: We believe in trust, appreciation and fairness. You pay what the song is worth to you. We do this out of conviction â€“ and we're happy if you support us.

q6.question: In what form do I receive the song?
q6.answer: You receive a high-quality audio recording (e.g. as an MP3 file), optionally also the lyrics.

q7.question: Can I express wishes â€“ e.g. music style or certain words?
q7.answer: Of course! You're welcome to indicate in the questionnaire if you have specific wishes or ideas. We'll try to implement it as best as possible.

q8.question: Who is the song intended for?
q8.answer: For everyone who wants to say goodbye in a personal way â€“ whether as a family, group of friends or individual.

q9.question: What happens to my information?
q9.answer: Your answers remain confidential. We only use them for the song and treat them with the utmost respect.

q10.question: Can I contact you in advance?
q10.answer: Of course. Write to us anytime â€“ we're here for you.
